page.title: 14HEALTH CARE IN STOTTESDON
page.content: Most people in the block are patients of the{Ditton Priors Practice,}which holds a weekly session in Stottesdon where a new surgery is to be built. A few attend{Cleobury Mortimer}& are referred to different hospitals. The travelling distances involved are similar. GPs are responsible for {ante-natal care}& babies are born at Bridgnorth or Shrewsbury. Midwives, District Nurses & Health Visitors are available for home visits. A mobile {baby clinic}visits the village for advice, immunisation & developmental tests monthly. People in this block visit the { Chemist }at Cleobury/Bridgnorth { Chiropodist}at Cleobury/Bridgnorth { Optician }at B'north/Kidderminster { Dentist }at B'north/Ludlow The Ditton Practice has a{dispensary. Almost all visits are by car.
